main.name: Xinrong Li
main.description: Driven by curiosity and a passion for innovation, I am always passionate about my work and approach every challenge with a positive attitude
main.bio: My name is Li Xinrong, and I graduated with a Master of Information Technology from Flinders University. During my studies, I developed a strong passion for both front-end and back-end development, honing my skills in creating efficient and user-friendly applications. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I am eager to apply my knowledge in real-world projects and continue growing in the field of software development.

address.line1: City: Adelaide (available to work in any city)

project.name: What I Learned
project.skills: HTML | CSS | React.js | Axios | Node.js | Express.js| RESTful API| MySQL
project.description: A full-stack web application that allows users to log and manage their daily learning experiences.

project.name: Personal CV
project.skills: HTML | CSS | Java Script | React.js | Jquery
project.description: This is a responsive personal website that showcases my resume, project experience, and technical skills, designed to showcase my professional background and development capabilities.
